member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsExternalInit
member.summary: Reserved to be used by the compiler for tracking metadata. This class should not be used by developers in source code.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Windows.Resources.Strings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Windows.Resources.Strings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Windows.Resources.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Windows.Resources.Strings.ClickOnceNamespaceCommentWithUrl
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Although ClickOnce is supported on .NET 5+, apps do not have access to the {0} namespace. For more details see {1} and {2}..

member.name: P:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Windows.Resources.Strings.DefaultFontChanged
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Default font in Windows Forms has been changed from Microsoft Sans Serif to Segoe UI, in order to change the default font use the API - Application.SetDefaultFont(Font font)..

member.name: P:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Windows.Resources.Strings.RemovingFile
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Removing file '{0}'..

member.name: P:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Windows.Resources.Strings.ReplacingValueInFile
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Replacing '{0}' with '{1}' in '{2}'..

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Windows.Services.RegistryService
member.summary: Note: this service only works on windows. On mac it would always return null values. Check OS in code before calling its methods and plan different way to get data for OSX or Linux.

member.summary: Updates Application.EnableVisualStyles(); with Application.SetHighDpiMode(HighDpiMode.{highDpiValue}) in main method.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Windows.Transformers.WindowsTargetFrameworkTransformer
